description: An appeals court annuls a previous Dutch ruling favouring Russia, in a fight with shareholders.
title: Dutch court backs $50bn Yukos claim against Russia
title_page: Dutch court backs $50bn Yukos claim against Russia - BBC News
maintext: The PCA ruling was upheld by the appeals judges on Tuesday, who said Russia was obliged to enforce the 1994 international Energy Charter Treaty, "unless it was in breach of Russian law". "This court finds that there was no breach of Russian law," they said.
